Player History
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 6/19/1966...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1966...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1969, hitting .600 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/10/1969 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
